home.description: Centrulized databez of varioz game assets

github.desc: For transparency, wanderer.moe is Open Source on GitHub. The code is available for anyone to view and contribute to.

donate.title: Donate
donate.desc: wanderer.moe is ad-free and will always be free to use. If you enjoy the site and want to help with server costs, maintenance and development, consider donating.

discord.desc: Join the discord server for site updates, assets not on the site, and more

footer.fanmadeNotice: wanderer.moe iz a fanmade website. All filez r propertiez of their ownerz.

contributors.title: Contributoorz
contributors.desc: A big thank yoo to all of teh amazin' peeps who haz helpd contribute to teh site :3

game.info: Click on a section 2 view its contentz.

asset.info: Tap on an asset 2 select it, double tap an image 2 enlarge it.
asset.nothingFoundSuggestions: If thars an asset ure looking 4 that u wants add, fill out teh asset request form.
asset.onMobile: If ure havin issuez downloadin, read teh FAQ by pressin teh info symbl nxt 2 teh gamez naym :3

faq.title: Frequently Askd Queshuns
faq.purpose: Wut iz teh purpose ov dis siet?
faq.purposeAnswer: wanderer.moe iz websiet dat hosts collecshun ov assets frum various gamez. Teh assets r organizd by game an asset type, teh saek ov dis websiet iz 2 provide sentralizd locashun 4 peeps 2 download assets frum.
faq.downloadMultipleOrAll: How do I downld multiple or all assets?
faq.downloadMultipleOrAllAnswer: 2 download multiple, select teh assets u wants 2 download by clickin/tappin on them. Den click teh 'download selectd' butn. 2 download all assets, click teh 'download all' butn. Dis will save as zip file into ur downloadz foldr.
faq.downloadOnMobileAnswer: Mak sure dat u r not viewin teh websiet thru soshul media apps, but instead built in browsr on ur fone. If u r on ifone, I recommend usin Safari.
faq.howToExtract: How 2 extract teh zip file aftr downloadin?
faq.howToExtractAnswer: If u r on windows, u can use 7zip 2 extract teh filez. If u r on mac, u can use teh built in archiv utility. If u r on ifone, tap on teh .zip file, open teh foldr it createz, select teh imagez an den save 2 fotos. If u r on android, u can use file managr app 2 extract teh filez.
faq.issueNotFound: I has an issue that isn't listed here.
faq.issueNotFoundAnswer: If u has an issue dat isnt listd her, u can join teh discord servr an ask 4 help thar.

errors.refresh: Try refreshin teh paeg or go bak 2 th home paeg
errors.apiError: An error occurrd while makin request 2 teh api, try again or refresh th paeg.
